name: Blended Caramel Coffee
description: A sweet, sugar-free caramel coffee blended with ice and topped with whipped cream.

name: Iced Wind Up Latte
description: Our signature iced latte, a perfect blend of rich espresso and cold milk.

name: Lavender Cold Brew
description: Smooth cold brew infused with a hint of lavender and topped with luscious cold foam.

name: Iced Blueberry Mocha Macchiato
description: A beautiful and delicious macchiato with layers of blueberry, rich mocha, and espresso.

name: Iced Tres Leches Macchiato
description: A sweet and creamy macchiato inspired by the classic dessert, with notes of three milks.

name: Iced Americano
description: A bold and refreshing Iced Americano, made with rich espresso shots and chilled water.

name: Iced Matcha Latte
description: A vibrant and earthy iced matcha latte, perfectly balanced with milk.

name: Iced Blueberry Matcha
description: A unique twist on a classic, combining earthy matcha with sweet blueberry cold foam.

name: Kids Strawberry Shake
description: A delightful strawberry shake made for kids, topped with whipped cream.

name: Blue Raspberry Shake
description: A fun and fruity blue raspberry shake, topped with whipped cream.

name: Kid's Chocolate Shake
description: A classic chocolate shake with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle. A kid-friendly favorite!

name: Pineapple Cream Energy Drink
description: A tropical boost of energy with pineapple and a smooth cream finish.

name: Pomegranate Raspberry Energy Drink
description: A vibrant and fruity energy drink with the sweet and tart flavors of pomegranate and raspberry.

name: Blue Lagoon Energy Drink
description: A refreshingly sweet and vibrant blue energy drink to power your day.
